full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE RIN PO CHE LA BRTEN PA'I ME TOG SGRUB TSUL MDOR BSDUS GSER GYI ME TOG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @155B (ZHES RJE BLA MA LA BRTEN NAS ME TOG SGRUB TSUL GSER GYI ME TOG CES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MANG DU THOS PA'I MCHOG GYUR TH'ON BLA MA DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS LHA GOS BCAS BSKUL MA BYUNG YANG, 'DI RIGS GSAR RTZOM LA DANG BZO'I NYES PA 'BYUNG NYEN CHE MOD, SKU'I RJES GNANG GI SKABS 'BRU LHAR DMIGS NAS 'THOR BA DAR RIL BU SGRUB TSUL LA KHA BSGYUR LTA BU SONG GSHIS 'GAL BA MED DAM SNYAM NAS NGO MA BZLOG TZAM DU BRIS SHING, BSKUL BA PO YANG 'BYOR MA THAG GRVA BA GZHAN ZHIG GIS KYANG GSER GYI ME TOG GSAR BA KHYER BYUNG BA'I @156A *, ,DGA' SPRO DANG BCAS PA RTA TSAG PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SHING 'BRUG GI ZLA TSES BZANG POR SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
